mapper.select: SELECT * FROM exam_class_dict a WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId} and a.del_flag = '0'
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.serial_no AS "serialNo", a.exam_class_code AS "examClassCode", a.exam_class_name AS "examClassName", a.input_code AS "inputCode", a.perform_by AS "performBy", a.print_style AS "printStyle", a.specialties_dept AS "specialtiesDept", a.loacal_id_class AS "loacalIdClass", a.performed_by AS "performedBy", a.seq_name AS "seqName", a.creatr_by AS "creatrBy", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO exam_class_dict( id, org_id, serial_no, exam_class_code, exam_class_name, input_code, perform_by, print_style, specialties_dept, loacal_id_class, ward_code, http_ip, memo, outp_perform, remarks, update_by, create_by, update_date, del_flag, create_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{serialNo}, #{examClassCode}, #{examClassName}, #{inputCode}, #{performBy}, #{printStyle}, #{specialtiesDept}, #{loacalIdClass}, #{wardCode}, #{httpIp}, #{memo}, #{outpPerform}, #{remarks}, #{updateBy}, #{createBy}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE exam_class_dict SET org_id = #{orgId}, serial_no = #{serialNo}, exam_class_code = #{examClassCode}, exam_class_name = #{examClassName}, input_code = #{inputCode}, perform_by = #{performBy}, print_style = #{printStyle}, specialties_dept = #{specialtiesDept}, loacal_id_class = #{loacalIdClass}, ward_code = #{wardCode}, http_ip = #{httpIp}, memo = #{memo}, outp_perform = #{outpPerform}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, exam_class_code, exam_class_name, perform_by, loacal_id_class, performed_by FROM exam_class_dict
